>Paladin: Someone who is proficient with both magic and combat.
>Key word, magic
>Majin Boo was created by a wizard, ergo, he's a magician.
>He can beat the living shit out of you, ergo, proficient combat.
>Conclusion: Majin Boo is the most powerful Paladin in the Universe.
